amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $500,000 and increases funds for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) outreach by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $500,000 and increase funds for the Defense Health Program by the same amount.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
